heroSection.title: Migrate from WordPress to Shopify Without Losing Traffic or Sales
heroSection.content: Is your WordPress e-commerce site holding back your growth? We specialize in seamless WordPress to Shopify migrations that protect your SEO rankings, customer data, and revenue — so you can scale confidently.

processSection.subtitle: Our Process
processSection.title: How We Move Your Store Safely to Shopify

steps.title: Full Site Audit
steps.content: We thoroughly review your WordPress setup, plugins, themes, and any custom code to plan a clean, efficient migration.

steps.title: Data Mapping & Planning
steps.content: Products, customers, orders, blogs, and SEO data are carefully mapped to align perfectly with Shopify’s architecture.

steps.title: Design Rebuild
steps.content: We rebuild your store on Shopify with a fresh, mobile-optimized, and conversion-focused design.

steps.title: Content & Product Transfer
steps.content: From product details to blog posts and images, all content is migrated seamlessly with clean formatting.

steps.title: SEO Preservation
steps.content: We implement 301 redirects, retain all meta data, and preserve your URL structure to maintain and even improve your SEO rankings.

steps.title: Pre-Launch Testing
steps.content: A full staging site is tested rigorously across browsers and devices to ensure everything is perfect before going live.

whyChoose.subtitle: Why Choose Us
whyChoose.title: Your Shopify Store, Seamlessly Delivered
whyChoose.content: We don’t just migrate — we transform your online store into a faster, more secure, and conversion-focused experience. Our proven approach ensures you keep your traffic and sales momentum without any downtime.
listItems: Dedicated Shopify Experts on Every Project

chooseContent.title: Built for E-Commerce
chooseContent.content: Say goodbye to plugin conflicts — Shopify is purpose-built for seamless online selling.

chooseContent.title: Faster Site Speeds
chooseContent.content: Stores we migrate often load 50% faster thanks to Shopify’s robust CDN and optimized infrastructure.

chooseContent.title: Enterprise-Level Security
chooseContent.content: SSL, PCI compliance, and automatic updates handled for you — no third-party security plugins needed.

chooseContent.title: Mobile-First Checkout
chooseContent.content: Shopify themes deliver smooth, one-click checkouts optimized for mobile shoppers.

chooseContent.title: Lower Total Cost of Ownership
chooseContent.content: No server fees or plugin purchases — Shopify’s all-in-one solution reduces maintenance costs dramatically.

chooseContent.title: All-in-One Platform
chooseContent.content: Built-in analytics, inventory, and marketing tools mean fewer apps and better performance.

heading.title: Real-World Applications
heading.subtitle: See How We’ve Helped Brands Thrive

appContent.appContent: Migrated from WordPress and achieved a 67% boost in mobile conversions with a streamlined, high-speed checkout experience.
Reduced reliance on 15+ plugins, eliminating maintenance headaches and achieving 45% faster site speeds.
Preserved SEO authority and increased conversion rates by 23% after moving to a custom Shopify build.
Simplified complex inventory and removed plugin conflicts using Shopify’s native tools and features.

faq.faqsubtitle: We Don’t Just Migrate — We Optimize

faqlist.title: Clean Code Rebuilds
faqlist.content: We eliminate bloated or outdated code and rebuild your Shopify theme from the ground up for maximum performance and maintainability.

faqlist.title: Structured SEO Data
faqlist.content: All meta tags, alt texts, and schema markup are migrated accurately and enhanced for better search visibility.

faqlist.title: Responsive Redesign
faqlist.content: We rigorously test layouts across devices and screen sizes, ensuring your site looks perfect from 320px to 1440px.

faqlist.title: Launch-Ready Testing
faqlist.content: Comprehensive cross-browser and device testing on Chrome, Safari, Firefox, and Edge — across Mac and Windows — ensures a flawless launch.
